Darkknight: It depends. Show me your licence first, kid. These guns 
are rather dangerous, so you need a licence to use them. Now lets 
see...

He enters a hatch and gets in the cargo bay. Activating his scanner, 
he sees nothing.

Darkknight: All right, kids. You two, and Meggy too, go check near 
those crates. If you see anyone, you tell me. I'll check the second 
floor.

He climbs the ladder. His scanner detects nothing.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Hottie4u2have1@a... wrote:
> Daytripper:Yeay guns wohooo.Can i shoot em off ?
